description: This step involves visualizing traffic planning and simulation results using GIS tools to create interactive maps, dashboards, and spatial analyses that support data-driven decision-making.

methods_used.description: Utilizing GIS software to overlay simulation outputs on geographic maps, enabling spatial analysis of traffic patterns and infrastructure.
Creating interactive dashboards with Grafana to monitor real-time simulation metrics and traffic signal performance.
Analyzing spatial relationships and traffic flow distributions to identify congestion hotspots and assess infrastructure performance.
